Kobina Nyarko bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe n'oge a na Ghana
A mụrụ ya na March 14, 1972 na Takoradi, Ghana, ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Nyarko na nso nso a na-enyocha ihe nnọchianya nke azụ na eserese ndị na-egosi ọtụtụ obere azụ na nnukwu akwa
Isiokwu "akara ahịa" a na-eme ka ọrụ ya dị mfe ịmata.
A zụrụ Nyarko na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2003 wee nweta BA na Industrial Art.
Na Mee 2007, e gosipụtara Kobina Nyarko na ihe ngosi na San Diego Museum of Man, Artists Speak: Contemporary art from Ghana and Zimbabwe

A na-ewere ọrụ ya dị ka ihe atụ nke ọgbọ nke atọ nke ndị na-ese ihe na Ghana, bụ ndị na-egosipụta onwe ha n'efu dị ka ndị na-ese ihe n'ụwa nke oge a, na-enweghị ọdịda n'echiche mgbochi nke nka Afrịka.
Kobina Nyarko na nwunye ya na nwa ya nwoke bi na Takoradi ugbu a.
